graphy.name: graphy
graphy.description: A comprehensive RDF toolkit including triplestores, intuitive writers, and the fastest JavaScript parsers on the Web

factory.name: @graphy/factory
factory.description: Create instances of Terms and Triples/Quads. Implements @RDFJS DataFactory

store.name: @graphy/store
store.description: Query an RDF graph using patterns and paths

writer.name: @graphy/writer
writer.description: Produce quads using nestable concise term string objects

set.name: @graphy/set
set.description: Create a mathematical set of triples for comparison and operations such as union, intersection, difference, etc.

viz.name: @graphy/viz
viz.description: Create graphviz visualizations of triples and quads
